installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# shellcheck shell=dash
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip build-essential libtool
if [ "${NVM_STATUS}" = "1" ]; then
export NVM_DIR=/mnt/server/.nvm
export NODE_VERSION=18.16.0
mkdir -p $NVM_DIR
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.39.3/install.sh -o install.sh
chmod a+x ./install.sh
./install.sh
rm ./install.sh
nvm install $NODE_VERSION
nvm alias default $NODE_VERSION
nvm use default
echo "source /home/container/.nvm/nvm.sh" > /etc/profile.d/nvm.sh
echo "source /home/container/.nvm/nvm.sh" > /mnt/server/.bashrc
chmod +x /etc/profile.d/nvm.sh
fi
chmod -R 775 /mnt/server/*
if [ ! -d "./logs" ]; then
mkdir logs
fi
echo "1.0" > logs/egg_version

variables.name: GIT Repository URL
variables.description:
GitHub Repo to clone

EX: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/repo_name

variables.name: Install Branch
variables.description:
Which branch to pull from Github.

The default is blank to pull the default branch from the repo

variables.name: Automatic Update
variables.description: Get the latest files on startup when using a GitHub repo.

variables.name: Additional Module Packages
variables.description:
Install additional module packages.

Use spaces to separate.

variables.name: Git Access Token
variables.description:
Password to use with Git.

It is best practice to use a Personal Access Token.
https://github.com/settings/tokens
https://gitlab.com/-/profile/personal_access_tokens

variables.name: Uninstall Module Packages
variables.description:
Uninstall module packages.

Use spaces to separate.

variables.name: Enable NVM
variables.description: This will enable the ability to use different versions of Node.js without changing the Docker image. If enabled, reinstall the server (nothing will be deleted).

variables.name: Try until it breaks!
variables.description: How many times can the code break? If it exceeds this number, it will stop looping the code.
